entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing after midnight. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
